rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TX.SETCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of a specific Trial Set, as defined by the sponsor. Maximum 8 characters. This represents the Trial Set for which parameters are being submitted.
datasetVariables.label: Set Code
datasetVariables.name: SETCD

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TX.SET

datasetVariables.description: Long description of a specific Trial Set, as defined by the sponsor.
datasetVariables.label: Set Description
datasetVariables.name: SET

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TX.TXSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Unique number for this record within this dataset. (This sequence should be unique within the entire dataset because there is no USUBJID.)
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: TXSEQ

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C90009

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TX.TXPARMCD

datasetVariables.description: Short character value for the Trial Set parameter described in TXPARM. Maximum 8 characters.
datasetVariables.label: Trial Set Parameter Short Name
datasetVariables.name: TXPARMCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C90007

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TX.TXPARM

datasetVariables.description: Term for the Trial Set parameter. Maximum 40 characters.
datasetVariables.label: Trial Set Parameter
datasetVariables.name: TXPARM

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.0 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable TX.TXVAL

datasetVariables.description: Value of the Trial Set parameter (e.g., Fed ad libitum or Restricted Feeding when TXPARM is FEEDREG). Some parameters may be subject to controlled terminology. See the Controlled Terms, Codelist, or Format column in Section 7.4.2 that lists all defined Trial Set parameters.
datasetVariables.label: Trial Set Parameter Value
datasetVariables.name: TXVAL

description: A trial design domain that contains one record for each trial set characteristic including experimental factors, treatment factors, inherent characteristics, or distinct sponsor designations. This domain is not subject oriented. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C95103, 2018-06-29)
label: Trial Sets
name: TX
